mdRecord.dcterms:title: Not in the curriculum: a book of friendly counsel to students / by two recent college graduates; with an introduction by Henry Van Dyke
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Ora Fletcher, 1875-
Janeway, Frank Latimer, 1880-
Van Dyke, Henry, 1852-1933
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The first draft ... was made by ... [Ora F. Gardner] who after leaving college went to work in a foreign land. He sent the manuscript home to his friend [Frank L. Janeway] who has edited it, and has added chapters XVI-XIX, and some of the longer paragraphs in other chapters (in all about one-third of the book)"--Introd.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Student ethics
Conduct of life
